channel.title: Rune-MTP 317 v3 & 614 v2 Summoning Progress [MORE NEW PICS]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]feel free to leave a reply[/size] The people who used to play this server when I hosted it knew I stopped because I really wanted to take some time to do summoning. Theres more bugs than I can count but a lot of it does work.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/124bszk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/3v9ci.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/15p1mrs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/j66hw2.jpg[/img] They will tele back to you when you get far enough away [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2crtzdv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/qozhh3.jpg[/img]
Next I'm working on the summoning tab below the run energy so you can actually take your items quickly
_________________________________________________________________________________
Now starting on a 317 [PI] Will be MTP v3 and will not be a shitty DSPK server. MTP v2 has over 4k download and I hope this gets even bigger than that.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/14o59qp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2ufr1xv.png[/img]
Credits: Rene gave me the Full screen HD client for the PI. He's awsome :)

item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

hawkgames:

I just delete them, but eventually I get tired and try to get new models.

What do you mean by new models? Like 602 or what?

item.title: Rune-MTP 317 v3 & 614 v2 Summoning Progress [MORE NEW PICS]
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:22, topic:392619”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=489792.msg3588449#msg3588449 date=1304377642]

Looks very nice, hope you don’t drop it like everyone else does.

I don’t plan on it.
[/quote]You should try to fix the trees. It’s annoying whenever I see a Hybrid Pvp server with those screwed up trees lol. :P[/quote]

Yeah I’m changing back a lot of models that I don’t like. Trying to stay away from all the new gfx and stuff but that might be hard to do

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:6, topic:392619”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=489792.msg3580880#msg3580880 date=1303781335]
I CAN MOEDRAOTRZ?

Good luck, you rarely see any 614, except for little kids who usually come and leech a 614 then fail with the development; giving up 10 seconds later, but i believes in you: D
[/quote]

I hope I don’t quit on this like my delta summoning. I’ll post some cb proggy pics tomorrow.[/quote]
Well npcs, animations and gfx are already there

Now you just need to put them together
